directions.step:
Melt butter in a 9- or 10-inch microwavable pie pan. Combine 3 tablespoons sugar and cinnamon and sprinkle on melted butter. Arrange apple slices over this mixture.
Cook in microwave oven on high for 2 minutes; cool slightly.
Beat eggs, milk and flour and remaining 1 tablespoon sugar plus a dash of salt until smooth. Pour over apple mixture and bake at 400Â° F for 15 to 20 minutes until puffy and nicely browned. Serves 4.
NOTES : Each time Laurie "innsat" for us she would leave the menus she had prepared for breakfast and I kept seeing this "Apple Puff Pancake" on her list. Finally I asked her about this recipe and she shared it with me. I use it often and it is always well received. In her other life, Laurie is an outstanding seventh grade language arts teacher.
